metadata.title: CVE-2020-12394 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A logic flaw in our location bar implementation could have allowed a localattacker to spoof the current location by selecting a different origin andremoving focus from the input element. This vulnerability affects Firefox <76.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
